page.title: 10HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: There is a doctors surgery at Ramsbury with 4 GPs, a trainee and a nurse, supported by a health visitor and 2 district nurses. 2 midwives are attached to Savernake Hospital at Marlborough. All drugs on prescription are supplied by the surgery pharmicist and delivered for collection from the newsagents shop. Savernake is a cottage hospital with maternity and geriatric wards and day care centre. Princess Margaret Hospital in Swindon deals with casualties and patients requiring specialist treatment. Ridgeway Hospital provides for private patients. There are dental surgeries in Marlborough, Hungerford and Swindon and a mobile unit visits the school twice a year. There is a volunteer ambulance and fire engine at Ramsbury with regular ambulance services linking patients to hospitals
